text: Mike Sosene-Feagai (born 17 April 1993) is an Samoan born, New Zealand raised, United States rugby union player. He plays as a hooker. He previously played for Auckland rugby union team in the Mitre 10. He plays his club rugby with Old Glory DC, and plays for the United States internationally. ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Apia Category:Samoan rugby union players Category:New Zealand rugby union players Category:American rugby union players Category:Samoan emigrants to New Zealand Category:New Zealand emigrants to the United States Category:University of Waikato alumni Category:Rugby union hookers Category:United States international rugby union players
title: Mike Sosene-Feagai
